inputs.name: Command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Code Climate command to run.

inputs.name: ConfigPath
inputs.label: Config Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder path to the Code Climate configuration file.

inputs.name: AnalyzeFormat
inputs.label: Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Controls the output format of analysis.

inputs.name: SourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to source files which Code Climate should analyze. Should be sibling to the Config Path.

inputs.name: OutputPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to which Code Climate write analysis results.

inputs.name: Debug
inputs.label: Debug
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not to set CODECLIMATE_DEBUG=1.

inputs.name: EngineTimeout
inputs.label: Container Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of seconds for analysis container run-time provided via CONTAINER_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.

inputs.name: EngineMemLimit
inputs.label: Container Memory Limit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The amount of memory, in bytes, to be the upper bound for engine containers via ENGINE_MEMORY_LIMIT_BYTES.
